nodes.bodyText:
They share a name but are different functions; the one in UploadBatch.js is comparing by sentAt, but this change compares by when so there shouldn't be any impact.
Besides, the name is totally erroneous: these do not return comparator functions, they only return values. I would prefer renaming the one in UploadBatch too.

Yes they use different values but the idea is the same - some date/time used for sorting purposes. I like that Comparator in the name implies that it is used somehow in sorting them, but I also agree that the name doesn't match what the method actually does so I'm on the fence. I'll leave it to your discretion
this rename seems to be causing other issues during the hero
Reverted the rename, kept only the call to sort()
